description: Returns a list of schemas detected by Fleet Advisor Collectors in your account.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: If you specify any of the following filters, the output includes information for only those schemas that meet the filter criteria: complexity --- The schema's complexity, for example Simple. database-id --- The ID of the schema's database. database-ip-address --- The IP address of the schema's database. database-name --- The name of the schema's database. database-engine --- The name of the schema database's engine. original-schema-name --- The name of the schema's database's main schema. schema-id --- The ID of the schema, for example 15. schema-name --- The name of the schema. server-ip-address --- The IP address of the schema database's server. An example is: describe-fleet-advisor-schemas --filter Name="schema-id",Values="50" (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_items.name: FleetAdvisorSchemas
nested_items.description: A collection of SchemaResponse objects.

nested_items.name: CodeLineCount
nested_items.description: The number of lines of code in a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: CodeSize
nested_items.description: The size level of the code in a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: Complexity
nested_items.description: The complexity level of the code in a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: ServerId
nested_items.description: The ID of a server in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of a server in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name address of a server in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseInstance
nested_items.description: The database for a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseId
nested_items.description: The ID of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseIpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseEngine
nested_items.description: The database engine of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory, for example PostgreSQL.

nested_items.name: SchemaId
nested_items.description: The ID of a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: SchemaName
nested_items.description: The name of a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: OriginalSchema
nested_items.description: Describes a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: SchemaId
nested_items.description: The ID of a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: SchemaName
nested_items.description: The name of a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseId
nested_items.description: The ID of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: DatabaseIpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of a database in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory.

nested_items.name: Similarity
nested_items.description: The similarity value for a schema in a Fleet Advisor collector inventory. A higher similarity value indicates that a schema is likely to be a duplicate.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of NextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged.
